name: DARK by HJDA
description:
You are trapped in the space station and the power has been cut off.

Your oxygen is running out and you are hearing strange noises as the alien broken in.
Collect all the battery before you die of no oxygen...

Listen out to the alien, it is afraid of the light.

J - Designer

T - Musician (Feisty Fennekin)

H- Beta Tester

Music = Lurking... Searching....
